dmca.title: Cease and Decease - Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
Abhineet,

As you are well aware, TheDailyBuggle owns all of the rights to the intellectual property published at www.thedailybuggle.com. We have recently learned that you have posted similar articles with minor changes at www.thenoobdiary.com, whilst retaining the general idea of the article. For example, we refer to your posting entitled "Make a Wifi Hotspot On Your Windows PC for Free" as well as:

1. How to Find and Add Subtitles to Movies?
2. TOP 10 Multiplayer IPad Games
3. Some Cool Useful Windows Command Prompt Commands
4. Use These Apps to Make Ringtones For Free on Your Android Phone
5. Top 10 Web Browsers Of All Times
6. Top 10 Legal Music Download Websites

Your posting of these items is an infringement of TheDailyBuggle's intellectual property rights.

Based upon the foregoing, we hereby demand that you confirm to us in writing within ten days of receipt of this email that: (i) you have removed all infringing materials from your site, including the aforementioned articles; and (ii) you will refrain from posting any similar infringing material on the Internet or any other on-line service in the future. If you refuse to comply, legal action will be undertaken and punitive damages will be sought.

The foregoing is without waiver of any and all rights of TheDailyBuggle, all of which are expressly reserved herein.

Very truly yours,

Jackson Chung | Editor-in-Chief
www.thedailybuggle.com
